DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare healing times and subjective pain level responses of nepafenac to placebo after photo refractive keratomileusis (PRK) surgery.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Topical Nepafenac to Placebo in Corneal Epithelial Healing Times and Postoperative Pain Relief
DOC.criteria: 19 years or older with healthy ocular status and preoperative refractive anisometropia of less than 2.000 diopters between eyes undergoing bilateral PRK surgery. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Those desiring PRK in only one eye, those in need of additional topical eye medications, those with history of drug/alcohol abuse, women breastfeeding or pregnant. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
